Key Arguments: The author believes that the scientific community has lied about COVID-19 and mRNA vaccines, and suggests they may also be lying about climate change.
The submission argues that there is no correlation between CO2 levels and atmospheric temperature based on ice core data.
The author claims that raw temperature data from various global locations shows a cooling trend, contradicting the global warming narrative.
The submission suggests that the handling of COVID-19 by governments involved misinformation and disinformation, leading to unnecessary deaths and economic harm.
The author criticizes renewable energy policies, claiming they have led to increased electricity costs and economic vulnerability.
Main Themes: Distrust in scientific consensus on climate change and COVID-19.
Criticism of government policies and actions related to climate change and COVID-19.
Allegations of misinformation and disinformation by authorities and the scientific community.
Economic concerns related to energy policies and their impact on national security.
Notable Quotes: What you are seeing is very similar to what you saw with the lies promulgated about COVID-19.
The Chances of this being an error are Zero!
Cheap reliable energy is the foundation stone of any modern society.
